basics.name: MinSuan Teh
basics.label: Global Software Service Engineer at Huawei
basics.summary:
I'm a graduated Computer Science master's student at the University of Edinburgh, focusing on machine learning, IoT, systems, algorithms, and data structures. My interest particularly lies in reinforcement learning algorithms.

My experience includes tutoring and marking for informatics students, teaching Java, and enhancing my communication skills. I've also led software projects, including developing a human activity recognition Android application, which was both challenging and rewarding. In my free time, I enjoy reading, gaming, and chess.

I've recently joined Huawei as a Global Technical Service Engineer, providing global software services. This role aligns with my interest in global tech solutions and involves ensuring system performance and reliability for international clients.

work.name: Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.
work.location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
